name: faaaaaahhh
description: Plays the iconic FAAAH meme sound on every error. Because suffering should be funny.

faaaaaahhh.enabled.description: Enable or disable the FAAAH sound on errors.

faaaaaahhh.warningsEnabled.description: Enable or disable the AA sound on warnings.

faaaaaahhh.cooldownMs.description: Minimum time (ms) between consecutive sounds per kind. 0 = no cooldown.

faaaaaahhh.customSoundPath.description: Path to a custom .wav for errors. Leave empty to use built-in sounds.

faaaaaahhh.customWarningSoundPath.description: Path to a custom .wav for warnings. Leave empty to use built-in sounds.

faaaaaahhh.errorTierSounds.description: Custom WAV paths per error tier. tier1 = 1 new error, tier2 = 2-4, tier3 = 5+. Leave empty to use built-in.

faaaaaahhh.warningTierSounds.description: Custom WAV paths per warning tier. tier1 = 1 new warning, tier2 = 2+. Leave empty to use built-in.

faaaaaahhh.customSoundFolder.description: Folder of .wav files. A random file is picked on each error. Overrides tier system when set.

faaaaaahhh.customWarningSoundFolder.description: Folder of .wav files for warnings. A random file is picked per warning event.

faaaaaahhh.victoryEnabled.description: Play a victory sound when all errors in a file are fixed.

faaaaaahhh.customVictoryPath.description: Path to a custom .wav for the victory sound. Leave empty to use built-in.

faaaaaahhh.quietHoursStart.description: Start of quiet hours in 24h format (e.g. "09:00"). Leave empty to disable quiet hours.

faaaaaahhh.quietHoursEnd.description: End of quiet hours in 24h format (e.g. "17:00").

faaaaaahhh.soundPack.description: Active sound pack. Controls which bundled sounds are used when no custom paths are set.

faaaaaahhh.streakThresholdToast.description: Number of consecutive error events (without any fix) before showing the shame notification.

faaaaaahhh.terminalSoundEnabled.description: Play the AHHHH sound when a terminal command fails or is not recognized.

faaaaaahhh.customTerminalSoundPath.description: Path to a custom .wav for terminal mistype sounds. Leave empty to use built-in ahhhh.wav.

faaaaaahhh.volume.description: Playback volume for all sounds (0â€“100). Default 100 = full volume.
